name: Dice Fixer Simulator 2022
description:
You just got a job at the local dice fixing factory! Congrats! Just one problem, you lied in the interview and said you had experience weighing dice! If you want to keep this job and bring home the bacon for your partner and  4 adopted kids (7 including pets), you'll have to come up with a way to get through the factory's quality assurance testing!

Controls:

WASD to rotate the dice

Click on a dice face and type to edit it

Notes:

Reset is your friend

Dice can not be edited after first roll

Faces is the number of different faces on the dice, very literally

Spam the roll button in a pinch to fix the odds

*there is a bug where the faces requirement is always checked, this does not necessarily mean the requirement is filled
